thread.title: Budweiser’s powerful pro-immigration Super Bowl ad is a masterpiece | For The Win
thread.title_full: Budweiser’s powerful pro-immigration Super Bowl ad is a masterpiece | For The Win

author: Luke Kerr-Dineen
title: Budweiser’s powerful pro-immigration Super Bowl ad is a masterpiece | For The Win
text:
Follow @LukeKerrDineen 
We don’t vote on commercials here at For The Win — head over to our friends at Ad Meter for that — but it doesn’t take an expert to know this will probably be in the running by the time Super Bowl 51 is over 
Given the debate raging in Washington on immigration, the commercial is topical, but is so in a rather unique way. As USA TODAY notes, it simply re-enacts the story of Anheuser-Busch, who came to America in the 1800s as so many of our forefathers did. From a different country, with little more than a dream. 
It’s all tied to the company’s “building friendships over beers” campaign. I’ll toast to that. More NFL!
